title: Team Leaverbust choice options...
body: So I was playing a bot game with my friends because we didn't have time for a full one, I had to leave in the middle of the game knowing my friends will finish without me. They didn't mind at all and would even encourage me when I got back the game was still ongoing, I quickly levelled and turned the 2v5 around. After the game, the client informed me of a new leave bust for 20 minutes 5 times. The game was an intermediate bot game and my team didn't even mind me leaving, I never upset anyone and we still won the game. I'm paranoid from the fact that I got 5 leaver buster from an intermediate bot game! I'm suggesting that riot should add a function that allows teammates to choose whether or not they get to leave the game without penalty, more players would be satisfied that they aren't wasting more time than they should. I believe a team should decide whether or not the player gets the punishment, not the system, after all, it doesn't know the entire situation.

replies.body:
you are asking too much
Adding a specific thing in a game requires a lot of programming work. 
This is how the game works in general, you leave the game, you get punished 
In general, in normal and ranked game, leaving a game will definitely make people frustrating
Your idea only works when you are playing with your friends, how about soloQ-ers? I think they would "vote to punish" surely if someone leaves the game in the middle
Well, they can at least put it on premade, it would help a lot of people who need to urgently go say hospital.
